ayah: الٓمٓ
ayah_translit: alif-lam-meem
ayah_english: Alif Lam Mim

ayah: غُلِبَتِ ٱلرُّومُ
ayah_translit: ghulibati al-rumu
ayah_english: Have been defeated the Romans

ayah: غُلِبَتِ ٱلرُّومُ
ayah_translit: ghulibati al-rumu
ayah_english: Have been defeated the Romans

ayah: فِيٓ أَدۡنَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَهُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ غَلَبِهِمۡ سَيَغۡلِبُونَ
ayah_translit: fi adna al-ardi wahum min ba'di ghalabihim sayaghlibuna
ayah_english: In (the) nearest land But they after after their defeat will overcome

ayah: فِيٓ أَدۡنَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَهُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ غَلَبِهِمۡ سَيَغۡلِبُونَ

ayah: فِي بِضۡعِ سِنِينَۗ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ مِن قَبۡلُ وَمِنۢ بَعۡدُۚ وَيَوۡمَئِذٖ يَفۡرَحُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ
ayah_translit: fi bid'i sinina lillahi al-amru min qablu wamin ba'du wayawma-idhin yafrahu al-mu'minuna
ayah_english: Within a few years For Allah (is) the command before before and after and after And that day will rejoice the believers

ayah: فِي بِضۡعِ سِنِينَۗ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ مِن قَبۡلُ وَمِنۢ بَعۡدُۚ وَيَوۡمَئِذٖ يَفۡرَحُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ

ayah: بِنَصۡرِ ٱللَّهِۚ يَنصُرُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayah_translit: binasri al-lahi yansuru man yashau wahuwa al-'azizu al-rahimu
ayah_english: With (the) help (of) Allah He helps whom He wills And He (is) the All-Mighty the Most Merciful

ayah: وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِۖ لَا يُخۡلِفُ ٱللَّهُ وَعۡدَهُۥ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: wa'da al-lahi la yukh'lifu al-lahu wa'dahu walakinna akthara al-nasi la ya'lamuna
ayah_english: (It is the) Promise (of) Allah (Does) not fail Allah (in) His promise but most (of) [the] people (do) not know

ayah: وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِۖ لَا يُخۡلِفُ ٱللَّهُ وَعۡدَهُۥ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

ayah: يَعۡلَمُونَ ظَٰهِرٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَهُمۡ عَنِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ غَٰفِلُونَ
ayah_translit: ya'lamuna zahiran mina al-hayati al-dun'ya wahum ani al-akhirati hum ghafiluna
ayah_english: They know (the) apparent of the life (of) the world but they about the Hereafter [they] (are) heedless

ayah: يَعۡلَمُونَ ظَٰهِرٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَهُمۡ عَنِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ غَٰفِلُونَ
ayah_translit: ya'lamuna zahiran mina al-hayati al-dun'ya wahum ani al-akhirati hum ghafiluna
ayah_english: They know (the) apparent of the life (of) the world but they about the Hereafter [they] (are) heedless

ayah_english: They know (the) apparent of the life (of) the world but they about the Hereafter [they] (are) heedless

ayah: أَوَلَمۡ يَتَفَكَّرُواْ فِيٓ أَنفُسِهِمۗ مَّا خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَأَجَلٖ مُّسَمّٗىۗ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرٗا مِّنَ ٱلنَّاسِ بِلِقَآيِٕ رَبِّهِمۡ لَكَٰفِرُونَ
ayah_translit: awalam yatafakkaru fi anfusihim ma khalaqa al-lahu al-samawati wal-arda wama baynahuma illa bil-haqi wa-ajalin musamman wa-inna kathiran mina al-nasi biliqai rabbihim lakafiruna
ayah_english: Do not they ponder within themselves Not Allah (has) created Allah (has) created the heavens and the earth and what (is) between them except in truth and (for) a term appointed And indeed many of the people in (the) meeting (with) their Lord surely (are) disbelievers

ayah: أَوَلَمۡ يَتَفَكَّرُواْ فِيٓ أَنفُسِهِمۗ مَّا خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَأَجَلٖ مُّسَمّٗىۗ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرٗا مِّنَ ٱلنَّاسِ بِلِقَآيِٕ رَبِّهِمۡ لَكَٰفِرُونَ

ayah: أَوَلَمۡ يَتَفَكَّرُواْ فِيٓ أَنفُسِهِمۗ مَّا خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَأَجَلٖ مُّسَمّٗىۗ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرٗا مِّنَ ٱلنَّاسِ بِلِقَآيِٕ رَبِّهِمۡ لَكَٰفِرُونَ
ayah_translit: awalam yatafakkaru fi anfusihim ma khalaqa al-lahu al-samawati wal-arda wama baynahuma illa bil-haqi wa-ajalin musamman wa-inna kathiran mina al-nasi biliqai rabbihim lakafiruna

ayah_translit: awalam yatafakkaru fi anfusihim ma khalaqa al-lahu al-samawati wal-arda wama baynahuma illa bil-haqi wa-ajalin musamman wa-inna kathiran mina al-nasi biliqai rabbihim lakafiruna
ayah_english: Do not they ponder within themselves Not Allah (has) created Allah (has) created the heavens and the earth and what (is) between them except in truth and (for) a term appointed And indeed many of the people in (the) meeting (with) their Lord surely (are) disbelievers

ayah: أَوَلَمۡ يَسِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَيَنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ كَانُوٓاْ أَشَدَّ مِنۡهُمۡ قُوَّةٗ وَأَثَارُواْ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَعَمَرُوهَآ أَكۡثَرَ مِمَّا عَمَرُوهَا وَجَآءَتۡهُمۡ رُسُلُهُم بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِۖ فَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيَظۡلِمَهُمۡ وَلَٰكِن كَانُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡ يَظۡلِمُونَ
ayah_translit: awalam yasiru fi al-ardi fayanzuru kayfa kana aqibatu alladhina min qablihim kanu ashadda min'hum quwwatan wa-atharu al-arda wa'amaruha akthara mimma amaruha wajaathum rusuluhum bil-bayinati fama kana al-lahu liyazlimahum walakin kanu anfusahum yazlimuna
ayah_english: Have not they traveled in the earth and observed how was (the) end (of) those before them before them They were mightier to them (in) strength and they dug the earth and built (on) it more than what they have built (on) it And came (to) them their Messengers with clear proofs So not was Allah to wrong them but they were themselves (doing) wrong

ayah: أَوَلَمۡ يَسِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَيَنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ كَانُوٓاْ أَشَدَّ مِنۡهُمۡ قُوَّةٗ وَأَثَارُواْ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَعَمَرُوهَآ أَكۡثَرَ مِمَّا عَمَرُوهَا وَجَآءَتۡهُمۡ رُسُلُهُم بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِۖ فَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيَظۡلِمَهُمۡ وَلَٰكِن كَانُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡ يَظۡلِمُونَ

ayah: أَوَلَمۡ يَسِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَيَنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ كَانُوٓاْ أَشَدَّ مِنۡهُمۡ قُوَّةٗ وَأَثَارُواْ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَعَمَرُوهَآ أَكۡثَرَ مِمَّا عَمَرُوهَا وَجَآءَتۡهُمۡ رُسُلُهُم بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِۖ فَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيَظۡلِمَهُمۡ وَلَٰكِن كَانُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡ يَظۡلِمُونَ

ayah: ثُمَّ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسَـٰٓـُٔواْ ٱلسُّوٓأَىٰٓ أَن كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَكَانُواْ بِهَا يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ
ayah_translit: thumma kana aqibata alladhina asau al-sua an kadhabu biayati al-lahi wakanu biha yastahziuna
ayah_english: Then was (the) end (of) those who did evil the evil because they denied (the) Signs (of) Allah and were of them making mockery

ayah: ٱللَّهُ يَبۡدَؤُاْ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥ ثُمَّ إِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ
ayah_translit: al-lahu yabda-u al-khalqa thumma yu'iduhu thumma ilayhi tur'ja'una
ayah_english: Allah originates the creation then He repeats it then to Him you will be returned

ayah: ٱللَّهُ يَبۡدَؤُاْ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥ ثُمَّ إِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ
ayah_translit: al-lahu yabda-u al-khalqa thumma yu'iduhu thumma ilayhi tur'ja'una
ayah_english: Allah originates the creation then He repeats it then to Him you will be returned

ayah: وَيَوۡمَ تَقُومُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ يُبۡلِسُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ
ayah_translit: wayawma taqumu al-sa'atu yub'lisu al-muj'rimuna

ayah: وَلَمۡ يَكُن لَّهُم مِّن شُرَكَآئِهِمۡ شُفَعَـٰٓؤُاْ وَكَانُواْ بِشُرَكَآئِهِمۡ كَٰفِرِينَ
ayah_translit: walam yakun lahum min shurakaihim shufa'au wakanu bishurakaihim kafirina
ayah_english: And not will be for them among theirs partners any intercessors and they will be in their partners disbelievers

ayah: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ فَهُمۡ فِي رَوۡضَةٖ يُحۡبَرُونَ
ayah_translit: fa-amma alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati fahum fi rawdatin yuh'baruna
ayah_english: Then as for those who believed and did righteous deeds so they in a Garden will be delighted

ayah: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَلِقَآيِٕ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ مُحۡضَرُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-amma alladhina kafaru wakadhabu biayatina waliqai al-akhirati fa-ulaika fi al-'adhabi muh'daruna
ayah_english: But as for those who disbelieved and denied Our Signs and (the) meeting (of) the Hereafter then those in the punishment (will be) brought forth

ayah: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَلِقَآيِٕ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ مُحۡضَرُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-amma alladhina kafaru wakadhabu biayatina waliqai al-akhirati fa-ulaika fi al-'adhabi muh'daruna
ayah_english: But as for those who disbelieved and denied Our Signs and (the) meeting (of) the Hereafter then those in the punishment (will be) brought forth

ayah: فَسُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ حِينَ تُمۡسُونَ وَحِينَ تُصۡبِحُونَ
ayah_translit: fasub'hana al-lahi hina tum'suna wahina tus'bihuna
ayah_english: So glory be to Allah when you reach the evening and when you reach the morning

ayah: فَسُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ حِينَ تُمۡسُونَ وَحِينَ تُصۡبِحُونَ

ayah: وَلَهُ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَعَشِيّٗا وَحِينَ تُظۡهِرُونَ
ayah_translit: walahu al-hamdu fi al-samawati wal-ardi wa'ashiyyan wahina tuz'hiruna
ayah_english: And for Him (are) all praises in the heavens and the earth and (at) night and when you are at noon

ayah: وَلَهُ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَعَشِيّٗا وَحِينَ تُظۡهِرُونَ

ayah: يُخۡرِجُ ٱلۡحَيَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمَيِّتِ وَيُخۡرِجُ ٱلۡمَيِّتَ مِنَ ٱلۡحَيِّ وَيُحۡيِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَاۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ تُخۡرَجُونَ
ayah_translit: yukh'riju al-haya mina al-mayiti wayukh'riju al-mayita mina al-hayi wayuh'yi al-arda ba'da mawtiha wakadhalika tukh'rajuna
ayah_english: He brings forth the living from the dead and He brings forth the dead from the living and He gives life (to) the earth after its death and thus you will be brought forth

ayah: يُخۡرِجُ ٱلۡحَيَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمَيِّتِ وَيُخۡرِجُ ٱلۡمَيِّتَ مِنَ ٱلۡحَيِّ وَيُحۡيِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَاۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ تُخۡرَجُونَ

ayah: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦٓ أَنۡ خَلَقَكُم مِّن تُرَابٖ ثُمَّ إِذَآ أَنتُم بَشَرٞ تَنتَشِرُونَ
ayah_translit: wamin ayatihi an khalaqakum min turabin thumma idha antum basharun tantashiruna
ayah_english: And among His Signs (is) that He created you from dust then behold! You (are) human beings dispersing

ayah: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦٓ أَنۡ خَلَقَ لَكُم مِّنۡ أَنفُسِكُمۡ أَزۡوَٰجٗا لِّتَسۡكُنُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهَا وَجَعَلَ بَيۡنَكُم مَّوَدَّةٗ وَرَحۡمَةًۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
ayah_translit: wamin ayatihi an khalaqa lakum min anfusikum azwajan litaskunu ilayha waja'ala baynakum mawaddatan warahmatan inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin yatafakkaruna
ayah_english: And among His Signs (is) that He created for you from yourselves mates that you may find tranquility in them and He placed between you love and mercy Indeed in that surely (are) Signs for a people who reflect

ayah: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ خَلۡقُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَٱخۡتِلَٰفُ أَلۡسِنَتِكُمۡ وَأَلۡوَٰنِكُمۡۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّلۡعَٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: wamin ayatihi khalqu al-samawati wal-ardi wa-ikh'tilafu alsinatikum wa-alwanikum inna fi dhalika laayatin lil'alimina
ayah_english: And among His Signs (is the) creation (of) the heavens and the earth and the diversity (of) your languages and your colors Indeed in that surely (are) Signs for those of knowledge

ayah: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ خَلۡقُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَٱخۡتِلَٰفُ أَلۡسِنَتِكُمۡ وَأَلۡوَٰنِكُمۡۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّلۡعَٰلِمِينَ

ayah: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ خَلۡقُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَٱخۡتِلَٰفُ أَلۡسِنَتِكُمۡ وَأَلۡوَٰنِكُمۡۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّلۡعَٰلِمِينَ

ayah_english: And among His Signs (is the) creation (of) the heavens and the earth and the diversity (of) your languages and your colors Indeed in that surely (are) Signs for those of knowledge

ayah: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ مَنَامُكُم بِٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ وَٱبۡتِغَآؤُكُم مِّن فَضۡلِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَسۡمَعُونَ
ayah_translit: wamin ayatihi manamukum bi-al-layli wal-nahari wa-ib'tighaukum min fadlihi inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin yasma'una
ayah_english: And among His Signs (is) your sleep by night and the day [and] your seeking of His Bounty Indeed in that surely (are) Signs for a people who listen

ayah: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ مَنَامُكُم بِٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ وَٱبۡتِغَآؤُكُم مِّن فَضۡلِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَسۡمَعُونَ

ayah: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ يُرِيكُمُ ٱلۡبَرۡقَ خَوۡفٗا وَطَمَعٗا وَيُنَزِّلُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَيُحۡيِۦ بِهِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَآۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَعۡقِلُونَ
ayah_translit: wamin ayatihi yurikumu al-barqa khawfan watama'an wayunazzilu mina al-samai maan fayuh'yi bihi al-arda ba'da mawtiha inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin ya'qiluna
ayah_english: And among His Signs He shows you the lightning (causing) fear and hope and He sends down from the sky water and gives life therewith (to) the earth after its death Indeed in that surely (are) Signs for a people who use intellect

ayah: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ يُرِيكُمُ ٱلۡبَرۡقَ خَوۡفٗا وَطَمَعٗا وَيُنَزِّلُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَيُحۡيِۦ بِهِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَآۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَعۡقِلُونَ

ayah: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ يُرِيكُمُ ٱلۡبَرۡقَ خَوۡفٗا وَطَمَعٗا وَيُنَزِّلُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَيُحۡيِۦ بِهِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَآۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَعۡقِلُونَ

ayah: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦٓ أَن تَقُومَ ٱلسَّمَآءُ وَٱلۡأَرۡضُ بِأَمۡرِهِۦۚ ثُمَّ إِذَا دَعَاكُمۡ دَعۡوَةٗ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِذَآ أَنتُمۡ تَخۡرُجُونَ
ayah_translit: wamin ayatihi an taquma al-samau wal-ardu bi-amrihi thumma idha da'akum da'watan mina al-ardi idha antum takhrujuna
ayah_english: And among His Signs (is) that stands the heavens and the earth by His Command Then when He calls you (with) a call from the earth behold! You will come forth

ayah: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦٓ أَن تَقُومَ ٱلسَّمَآءُ وَٱلۡأَرۡضُ بِأَمۡرِهِۦۚ ثُمَّ إِذَا دَعَاكُمۡ دَعۡوَةٗ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِذَآ أَنتُمۡ تَخۡرُجُونَ

ayah_english: And among His Signs (is) that stands the heavens and the earth by His Command Then when He calls you (with) a call from the earth behold! You will come forth

ayah: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦٓ أَن تَقُومَ ٱلسَّمَآءُ وَٱلۡأَرۡضُ بِأَمۡرِهِۦۚ ثُمَّ إِذَا دَعَاكُمۡ دَعۡوَةٗ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِذَآ أَنتُمۡ تَخۡرُجُونَ
ayah_translit: wamin ayatihi an taquma al-samau wal-ardu bi-amrihi thumma idha da'akum da'watan mina al-ardi idha antum takhrujuna
ayah_english: And among His Signs (is) that stands the heavens and the earth by His Command Then when He calls you (with) a call from the earth behold! You will come forth

ayah: وَلَهُۥ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ كُلّٞ لَّهُۥ قَٰنِتُونَ
ayah_translit: walahu man fi al-samawati wal-ardi kullun lahu qanituna
ayah_english: And to Him (belongs) whoever (is) in the heavens and the earth All to Him (are) obedient

ayah: وَلَهُۥ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ كُلّٞ لَّهُۥ قَٰنِتُونَ

ayah_translit: walahu man fi al-samawati wal-ardi kullun lahu qanituna
ayah_english: And to Him (belongs) whoever (is) in the heavens and the earth All to Him (are) obedient

ayah: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي يَبۡدَؤُاْ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥ وَهُوَ أَهۡوَنُ عَلَيۡهِۚ وَلَهُ ٱلۡمَثَلُ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
ayah_translit: wahuwa alladhi yabda-u al-khalqa thumma yu'iduhu wahuwa ahwanu alayhi walahu al-mathalu al-a'la fi al-samawati wal-ardi wahuwa al-'azizu al-hakimu
ayah_english: And He (is) the One Who originates the creation then repeats it and it (is) easier for Him And for Him (is) the description the highest in the heavens and the earth And He (is) the All-Mighty the All-Wise

ayah: ضَرَبَ لَكُم مَّثَلٗا مِّنۡ أَنفُسِكُمۡۖ هَل لَّكُم مِّن مَّا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَٰنُكُم مِّن شُرَكَآءَ فِي مَا رَزَقۡنَٰكُمۡ فَأَنتُمۡ فِيهِ سَوَآءٞ تَخَافُونَهُمۡ كَخِيفَتِكُمۡ أَنفُسَكُمۡۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لِقَوۡمٖ يَعۡقِلُونَ
ayah_translit: daraba lakum mathalan min anfusikum hal lakum min ma malakat aymanukum min shurakaa fi ma razaqnakum fa-antum fihi sawaon takhafunahum kakhifatikum anfusakum kadhalika nufassilu al-ayati liqawmin ya'qiluna
ayah_english: He sets forth to you an example from yourselves Is for you among what posses your right hands any partners in what We have provided you so you in it (are) equal you fear them as you fear yourselves Thus We explain the Verses for a people (who) use reason

ayah: بَلِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓاْ أَهۡوَآءَهُم بِغَيۡرِ عِلۡمٖۖ فَمَن يَهۡدِي مَنۡ أَضَلَّ ٱللَّهُۖ وَمَا لَهُم مِّن نَّـٰصِرِينَ
ayah_translit: bali ittaba'a alladhina zalamu ahwaahum bighayri il'min faman yahdi man adalla al-lahu wama lahum min nasirina
ayah_english: Nay follow those who do wrong their desires without knowledge Then who (can) guide (one) whom Allah has let go astray Allah has let go astray And not for them any helpers

ayah_english: Nay follow those who do wrong their desires without knowledge Then who (can) guide (one) whom Allah has let go astray Allah has let go astray And not for them any helpers

ayah: بَلِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓاْ أَهۡوَآءَهُم بِغَيۡرِ عِلۡمٖۖ فَمَن يَهۡدِي مَنۡ أَضَلَّ ٱللَّهُۖ وَمَا لَهُم مِّن نَّـٰصِرِينَ

ayah_english: Nay follow those who do wrong their desires without knowledge Then who (can) guide (one) whom Allah has let go astray Allah has let go astray And not for them any helpers

ayah: فَأَقِمۡ وَجۡهَكَ لِلدِّينِ حَنِيفٗاۚ فِطۡرَتَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّتِي فَطَرَ ٱلنَّاسَ عَلَيۡهَاۚ لَا تَبۡدِيلَ لِخَلۡقِ ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلدِّينُ ٱلۡقَيِّمُ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: fa-aqim wajhaka lilddini hanifan fit'rata al-lahi allati fatara al-nasa alayha la tabdila likhalqi al-lahi dhalika al-dinu al-qayimu walakinna akthara al-nasi la ya'lamuna
ayah_english: So set your face to the religion upright Nature (made by) Allah (upon) which He has created mankind [on it] No change (should there be) in the creation (of) Allah That (is) the religion the correct but most men (do) not know

ayah: فَأَقِمۡ وَجۡهَكَ لِلدِّينِ حَنِيفٗاۚ فِطۡرَتَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّتِي فَطَرَ ٱلنَّاسَ عَلَيۡهَاۚ لَا تَبۡدِيلَ لِخَلۡقِ ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلدِّينُ ٱلۡقَيِّمُ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

ayah: فَأَقِمۡ وَجۡهَكَ لِلدِّينِ حَنِيفٗاۚ فِطۡرَتَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّتِي فَطَرَ ٱلنَّاسَ عَلَيۡهَاۚ لَا تَبۡدِيلَ لِخَلۡقِ ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلدِّينُ ٱلۡقَيِّمُ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

ayah: ۞مُنِيبِينَ إِلَيۡهِ وَٱتَّقُوهُ وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَلَا تَكُونُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ
ayah_translit: munibina ilayhi wa-ittaquhu wa-aqimu al-salata wala takunu mina al-mush'rikina
ayah_english: Turning to Him and fear Him and establish the prayer and (do) not be of the polytheists

ayah: ۞مُنِيبِينَ إِلَيۡهِ وَٱتَّقُوهُ وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَلَا تَكُونُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

ayah: مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ فَرَّقُواْ دِينَهُمۡ وَكَانُواْ شِيَعٗاۖ كُلُّ حِزۡبِۭ بِمَا لَدَيۡهِمۡ فَرِحُونَ
ayah_translit: mina alladhina farraqu dinahum wakanu shiya'an kullu hiz'bin bima ladayhim farihuna
ayah_english: Of those who divide their religion and become sects each party in what they have rejoicing

ayah: مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ فَرَّقُواْ دِينَهُمۡ وَكَانُواْ شِيَعٗاۖ كُلُّ حِزۡبِۭ بِمَا لَدَيۡهِمۡ فَرِحُونَ

ayah_english: Of those who divide their religion and become sects each party in what they have rejoicing

ayah: وَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلنَّاسَ ضُرّٞ دَعَوۡاْ رَبَّهُم مُّنِيبِينَ إِلَيۡهِ ثُمَّ إِذَآ أَذَاقَهُم مِّنۡهُ رَحۡمَةً إِذَا فَرِيقٞ مِّنۡهُم بِرَبِّهِمۡ يُشۡرِكُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-idha massa al-nasa durrun da'aw rabbahum munibina ilayhi thumma idha adhaqahum min'hu rahmatan idha fariqun min'hum birabbihim yush'rikuna
ayah_english: And when touches men hardship they call their Lord turning to Him Then when He causes them to taste from Him Mercy behold! A party of them with their Lord associate partners

ayah: وَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلنَّاسَ ضُرّٞ دَعَوۡاْ رَبَّهُم مُّنِيبِينَ إِلَيۡهِ ثُمَّ إِذَآ أَذَاقَهُم مِّنۡهُ رَحۡمَةً إِذَا فَرِيقٞ مِّنۡهُم بِرَبِّهِمۡ يُشۡرِكُونَ

ayah: وَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلنَّاسَ ضُرّٞ دَعَوۡاْ رَبَّهُم مُّنِيبِينَ إِلَيۡهِ ثُمَّ إِذَآ أَذَاقَهُم مِّنۡهُ رَحۡمَةً إِذَا فَرِيقٞ مِّنۡهُم بِرَبِّهِمۡ يُشۡرِكُونَ

ayah: لِيَكۡفُرُواْ بِمَآ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡۚ فَتَمَتَّعُواْ فَسَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: liyakfuru bima ataynahum fatamatta'u fasawfa ta'lamuna
ayah_english: So as to deny [in] what We have granted them Then enjoy but soon you will know

ayah: أَمۡ أَنزَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ سُلۡطَٰنٗا فَهُوَ يَتَكَلَّمُ بِمَا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يُشۡرِكُونَ
ayah_translit: am anzalna alayhim sul'tanan fahuwa yatakallamu bima kanu bihi yush'rikuna
ayah_english: Or have We sent to them an authority and it speaks of what they were with Him associating

ayah_english: Or have We sent to them an authority and it speaks of what they were with Him associating

ayah: وَإِذَآ أَذَقۡنَا ٱلنَّاسَ رَحۡمَةٗ فَرِحُواْ بِهَاۖ وَإِن تُصِبۡهُمۡ سَيِّئَةُۢ بِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ إِذَا هُمۡ يَقۡنَطُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-idha adhaqna al-nasa rahmatan farihu biha wa-in tusib'hum sayyi-atun bima qaddamat aydihim idha hum yaqnatuna
ayah_english: And when We cause men to taste We cause men to taste mercy they rejoice therein But if afflicts them an evil for what have sent forth their hands behold They despair

ayah: وَإِذَآ أَذَقۡنَا ٱلنَّاسَ رَحۡمَةٗ فَرِحُواْ بِهَاۖ وَإِن تُصِبۡهُمۡ سَيِّئَةُۢ بِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ إِذَا هُمۡ يَقۡنَطُونَ

ayah: وَإِذَآ أَذَقۡنَا ٱلنَّاسَ رَحۡمَةٗ فَرِحُواْ بِهَاۖ وَإِن تُصِبۡهُمۡ سَيِّئَةُۢ بِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ إِذَا هُمۡ يَقۡنَطُونَ

ayah_translit: wa-idha adhaqna al-nasa rahmatan farihu biha wa-in tusib'hum sayyi-atun bima qaddamat aydihim idha hum yaqnatuna
ayah_english: And when We cause men to taste We cause men to taste mercy they rejoice therein But if afflicts them an evil for what have sent forth their hands behold They despair

ayah: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقۡدِرُۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
ayah_translit: awalam yaraw anna al-laha yabsutu al-riz'qa liman yashau wayaqdiru inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin yu'minuna
ayah_english: Do not they see that Allah extends the provision for whom He wills and straitens (it) Indeed in that surely (are) Signs for a people who believe

ayah: فَـَٔاتِ ذَا ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ حَقَّهُۥ وَٱلۡمِسۡكِينَ وَٱبۡنَ ٱلسَّبِيلِۚ ذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٞ لِّلَّذِينَ يُرِيدُونَ وَجۡهَ ٱللَّهِۖ وَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ
ayah_translit: faati dha al-qur'ba haqqahu wal-mis'kina wa-ib'na al-sabili dhalika khayrun lilladhina yuriduna wajha al-lahi wa-ulaika humu al-muf'lihuna
ayah_english: So give the relative the relative his right and the poor and the wayfarer and the wayfarer That (is) best for those who desire (the) Countenance (of) Allah And those they (are) the successful ones

ayah: فَـَٔاتِ ذَا ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ حَقَّهُۥ وَٱلۡمِسۡكِينَ وَٱبۡنَ ٱلسَّبِيلِۚ ذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٞ لِّلَّذِينَ يُرِيدُونَ وَجۡهَ ٱللَّهِۖ وَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ

ayah: فَـَٔاتِ ذَا ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ حَقَّهُۥ وَٱلۡمِسۡكِينَ وَٱبۡنَ ٱلسَّبِيلِۚ ذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٞ لِّلَّذِينَ يُرِيدُونَ وَجۡهَ ٱللَّهِۖ وَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ

ayah_english: So give the relative the relative his right and the poor and the wayfarer and the wayfarer That (is) best for those who desire (the) Countenance (of) Allah And those they (are) the successful ones

ayah: وَمَآ ءَاتَيۡتُم مِّن رِّبٗا لِّيَرۡبُوَاْ فِيٓ أَمۡوَٰلِ ٱلنَّاسِ فَلَا يَرۡبُواْ عِندَ ٱللَّهِۖ وَمَآ ءَاتَيۡتُم مِّن زَكَوٰةٖ تُرِيدُونَ وَجۡهَ ٱللَّهِ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُضۡعِفُونَ
ayah_translit: wama ataytum min riban liyarbuwa fi amwali al-nasi fala yarbu inda al-lahi wama ataytum min zakatin turiduna wajha al-lahi fa-ulaika humu al-mud'ifuna
ayah_english: And what you give for usury to increase in (the) wealth (of) people not (will) increase with Allah But what you give of zakah desiring (the) Countenance (of) Allah then those [they] (will) get manifold

ayah: وَمَآ ءَاتَيۡتُم مِّن رِّبٗا لِّيَرۡبُوَاْ فِيٓ أَمۡوَٰلِ ٱلنَّاسِ فَلَا يَرۡبُواْ عِندَ ٱللَّهِۖ وَمَآ ءَاتَيۡتُم مِّن زَكَوٰةٖ تُرِيدُونَ وَجۡهَ ٱللَّهِ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُضۡعِفُونَ

ayah: وَمَآ ءَاتَيۡتُم مِّن رِّبٗا لِّيَرۡبُوَاْ فِيٓ أَمۡوَٰلِ ٱلنَّاسِ فَلَا يَرۡبُواْ عِندَ ٱللَّهِۖ وَمَآ ءَاتَيۡتُم مِّن زَكَوٰةٖ تُرِيدُونَ وَجۡهَ ٱللَّهِ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُضۡعِفُونَ

ayah_translit: wama ataytum min riban liyarbuwa fi amwali al-nasi fala yarbu inda al-lahi wama ataytum min zakatin turiduna wajha al-lahi fa-ulaika humu al-mud'ifuna
ayah_english: And what you give for usury to increase in (the) wealth (of) people not (will) increase with Allah But what you give of zakah desiring (the) Countenance (of) Allah then those [they] (will) get manifold

ayah: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَكُمۡ ثُمَّ رَزَقَكُمۡ ثُمَّ يُمِيتُكُمۡ ثُمَّ يُحۡيِيكُمۡۖ هَلۡ مِن شُرَكَآئِكُم مَّن يَفۡعَلُ مِن ذَٰلِكُم مِّن شَيۡءٖۚ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ
ayah_translit: al-lahu alladhi khalaqakum thumma razaqakum thumma yumitukum thumma yuh'yikum hal min shurakaikum man yaf 'alu min dhalikum min shayin sub'hanahu wata'ala amma yush'rikuna
ayah_english: Allah (is) the One Who created you then He provided (for) you then He will cause you to die then He will give you life Is (there) any (of) your partners who does of that any thing Glory be to Him and exalted is He above what they associate

ayah: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَكُمۡ ثُمَّ رَزَقَكُمۡ ثُمَّ يُمِيتُكُمۡ ثُمَّ يُحۡيِيكُمۡۖ هَلۡ مِن شُرَكَآئِكُم مَّن يَفۡعَلُ مِن ذَٰلِكُم مِّن شَيۡءٖۚ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

ayah: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَكُمۡ ثُمَّ رَزَقَكُمۡ ثُمَّ يُمِيتُكُمۡ ثُمَّ يُحۡيِيكُمۡۖ هَلۡ مِن شُرَكَآئِكُم مَّن يَفۡعَلُ مِن ذَٰلِكُم مِّن شَيۡءٖۚ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

ayah_translit: al-lahu alladhi khalaqakum thumma razaqakum thumma yumitukum thumma yuh'yikum hal min shurakaikum man yaf 'alu min dhalikum min shayin sub'hanahu wata'ala amma yush'rikuna

ayah: ظَهَرَ ٱلۡفَسَادُ فِي ٱلۡبَرِّ وَٱلۡبَحۡرِ بِمَا كَسَبَتۡ أَيۡدِي ٱلنَّاسِ لِيُذِيقَهُم بَعۡضَ ٱلَّذِي عَمِلُواْ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ
ayah_translit: zahara al-fasadu fi al-bari wal-bahri bima kasabat aydi al-nasi liyudhiqahum ba'da alladhi amilu la'allahum yarji'una
ayah_english: Has appeared the corruption in the land and the sea for what have earned (the) hands (of) people so that He may let them taste a part (of) that which they have done so that they may return

ayah: ظَهَرَ ٱلۡفَسَادُ فِي ٱلۡبَرِّ وَٱلۡبَحۡرِ بِمَا كَسَبَتۡ أَيۡدِي ٱلنَّاسِ لِيُذِيقَهُم بَعۡضَ ٱلَّذِي عَمِلُواْ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ

ayah: ظَهَرَ ٱلۡفَسَادُ فِي ٱلۡبَرِّ وَٱلۡبَحۡرِ بِمَا كَسَبَتۡ أَيۡدِي ٱلنَّاسِ لِيُذِيقَهُم بَعۡضَ ٱلَّذِي عَمِلُواْ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ
ayah_translit: zahara al-fasadu fi al-bari wal-bahri bima kasabat aydi al-nasi liyudhiqahum ba'da alladhi amilu la'allahum yarji'una
ayah_english: Has appeared the corruption in the land and the sea for what have earned (the) hands (of) people so that He may let them taste a part (of) that which they have done so that they may return

ayah: ظَهَرَ ٱلۡفَسَادُ فِي ٱلۡبَرِّ وَٱلۡبَحۡرِ بِمَا كَسَبَتۡ أَيۡدِي ٱلنَّاسِ لِيُذِيقَهُم بَعۡضَ ٱلَّذِي عَمِلُواْ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ

ayah_english: Has appeared the corruption in the land and the sea for what have earned (the) hands (of) people so that He may let them taste a part (of) that which they have done so that they may return

ayah: قُلۡ سِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَٱنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلُۚ كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّشۡرِكِينَ
ayah_translit: qul siru fi al-ardi fa-unzuru kayfa kana aqibatu alladhina min qablu kana aktharuhum mush'rikina
ayah_english: Say Travel in the earth and see how was (the) end (of) those who (were) before (were) before Most of them were Most of them were polytheists

ayah: فَأَقِمۡ وَجۡهَكَ لِلدِّينِ ٱلۡقَيِّمِ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن يَأۡتِيَ يَوۡمٞ لَّا مَرَدَّ لَهُۥ مِنَ ٱللَّهِۖ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَصَّدَّعُونَ
ayah_translit: fa-aqim wajhaka lilddini al-qayimi min qabli an yatiya yawmun la maradda lahu mina al-lahi yawma-idhin yassadda'una
ayah_english: So set your face to the religion right before before [that] comes a Day not (can be) averted [it] from Allah That Day they will be divided

ayah: مَن كَفَرَ فَعَلَيۡهِ كُفۡرُهُۥۖ وَمَنۡ عَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَلِأَنفُسِهِمۡ يَمۡهَدُونَ
ayah_translit: man kafara fa'alayhi kuf'ruhu waman amila salihan fali-anfusihim yamhaduna
ayah_english: Whoever disbelieves then against him (is) his disbelief And whoever does righteousness then for themselves they are preparing

ayah: مَن كَفَرَ فَعَلَيۡهِ كُفۡرُهُۥۖ وَمَنۡ عَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَلِأَنفُسِهِمۡ يَمۡهَدُونَ
ayah_translit: man kafara fa'alayhi kuf'ruhu waman amila salihan fali-anfusihim yamhaduna
ayah_english: Whoever disbelieves then against him (is) his disbelief And whoever does righteousness then for themselves they are preparing

ayah_translit: man kafara fa'alayhi kuf'ruhu waman amila salihan fali-anfusihim yamhaduna
ayah_english: Whoever disbelieves then against him (is) his disbelief And whoever does righteousness then for themselves they are preparing

ayah: لِيَجۡزِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
ayah_translit: liyajziya alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati min fadlihi innahu la yuhibbu al-kafirina
ayah_english: That He may reward those who believe and do righteous deeds (out) of His Bounty Indeed He (does) not like the disbelievers

ayah: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦٓ أَن يُرۡسِلَ ٱلرِّيَاحَ مُبَشِّرَٰتٖ وَلِيُذِيقَكُم مِّن رَّحۡمَتِهِۦ وَلِتَجۡرِيَ ٱلۡفُلۡكُ بِأَمۡرِهِۦ وَلِتَبۡتَغُواْ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦ وَلَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ
ayah_translit: wamin ayatihi an yur'sila al-riyaha mubashiratin waliyudhiqakum min rahmatihi walitajriya al-ful'ku bi-amrihi walitabtaghu min fadlihi wala'allakum tashkuruna
ayah_english: And among His Signs (is) that He sends the winds (as) bearers of glad tidings and to let you taste of His Mercy and that may sail the ships at His Command and that you may seek of His Bounty and that you may be grateful

ayah: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦٓ أَن يُرۡسِلَ ٱلرِّيَاحَ مُبَشِّرَٰتٖ وَلِيُذِيقَكُم مِّن رَّحۡمَتِهِۦ وَلِتَجۡرِيَ ٱلۡفُلۡكُ بِأَمۡرِهِۦ وَلِتَبۡتَغُواْ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦ وَلَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ

ayah: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦٓ أَن يُرۡسِلَ ٱلرِّيَاحَ مُبَشِّرَٰتٖ وَلِيُذِيقَكُم مِّن رَّحۡمَتِهِۦ وَلِتَجۡرِيَ ٱلۡفُلۡكُ بِأَمۡرِهِۦ وَلِتَبۡتَغُواْ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦ وَلَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِكَ رُسُلًا إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِمۡ فَجَآءُوهُم بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ فَٱنتَقَمۡنَا مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجۡرَمُواْۖ وَكَانَ حَقًّا عَلَيۡنَا نَصۡرُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
ayah_translit: walaqad arsalna min qablika rusulan ila qawmihim fajauhum bil-bayinati fa-intaqamna mina alladhina ajramu wakana haqqan alayna nasru al-mu'minina
ayah_english: And verily We sent before you before you Messengers to their people and they came to them with clear proofs then We took retribution from those who committed crimes And it was incumbent upon Us (to) help the believers

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِكَ رُسُلًا إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِمۡ فَجَآءُوهُم بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ فَٱنتَقَمۡنَا مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجۡرَمُواْۖ وَكَانَ حَقًّا عَلَيۡنَا نَصۡرُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِكَ رُسُلًا إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِمۡ فَجَآءُوهُم بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ فَٱنتَقَمۡنَا مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجۡرَمُواْۖ وَكَانَ حَقًّا عَلَيۡنَا نَصۡرُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
ayah_translit: walaqad arsalna min qablika rusulan ila qawmihim fajauhum bil-bayinati fa-intaqamna mina alladhina ajramu wakana haqqan alayna nasru al-mu'minina
ayah_english: And verily We sent before you before you Messengers to their people and they came to them with clear proofs then We took retribution from those who committed crimes And it was incumbent upon Us (to) help the believers

ayah: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي يُرۡسِلُ ٱلرِّيَٰحَ فَتُثِيرُ سَحَابٗا فَيَبۡسُطُهُۥ فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ كَيۡفَ يَشَآءُ وَيَجۡعَلُهُۥ كِسَفٗا فَتَرَى ٱلۡوَدۡقَ يَخۡرُجُ مِنۡ خِلَٰلِهِۦۖ فَإِذَآ أَصَابَ بِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦٓ إِذَا هُمۡ يَسۡتَبۡشِرُونَ
ayah_translit: al-lahu alladhi yur'silu al-riyaha fatuthiru sahaban fayabsutuhu fi al-samai kayfa yashau wayaj'aluhu kisafan fatara al-wadqa yakhruju min khilalihi fa-idha asaba bihi man yashau min ibadihi idha hum yastabshiruna
ayah_english: Allah (is) the One Who sends the winds so they raise (the) clouds then He spreads them in the sky how He wills and He makes them fragments so you see the rain coming forth from their midst Then when He causes it to fall on He causes it to fall on whom He wills of His slaves behold They rejoice

ayah: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي يُرۡسِلُ ٱلرِّيَٰحَ فَتُثِيرُ سَحَابٗا فَيَبۡسُطُهُۥ فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ كَيۡفَ يَشَآءُ وَيَجۡعَلُهُۥ كِسَفٗا فَتَرَى ٱلۡوَدۡقَ يَخۡرُجُ مِنۡ خِلَٰلِهِۦۖ فَإِذَآ أَصَابَ بِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦٓ إِذَا هُمۡ يَسۡتَبۡشِرُونَ

ayah: وَإِن كَانُواْ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن يُنَزَّلَ عَلَيۡهِم مِّن قَبۡلِهِۦ لَمُبۡلِسِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-in kanu min qabli an yunazzala alayhim min qablihi lamub'lisina
ayah_english: And certainly they were before before [that] it was sent down upon them [before it] [before it] surely in despair

ayah: وَإِن كَانُواْ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن يُنَزَّلَ عَلَيۡهِم مِّن قَبۡلِهِۦ لَمُبۡلِسِينَ

ayah_translit: wa-in kanu min qabli an yunazzala alayhim min qablihi lamub'lisina
ayah_english: And certainly they were before before [that] it was sent down upon them [before it] [before it] surely in despair

ayah: فَٱنظُرۡ إِلَىٰٓ ءَاثَٰرِ رَحۡمَتِ ٱللَّهِ كَيۡفَ يُحۡيِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَآۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَمُحۡيِ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ
ayah_translit: fa-unzur ila athari rahmati al-lahi kayfa yuh'yi al-arda ba'da mawtiha inna dhalika lamuh'yi al-mawta wahuwa ala kulli shayin qadirun
ayah_english: So look at (the) effects (of the) Mercy (of) Allah how He gives life (to) the earth after its death Indeed that surely He (will) give life (to) the dead And He (is) on every thing All-Powerful

ayah: فَٱنظُرۡ إِلَىٰٓ ءَاثَٰرِ رَحۡمَتِ ٱللَّهِ كَيۡفَ يُحۡيِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَآۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَمُحۡيِ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ
ayah_translit: fa-unzur ila athari rahmati al-lahi kayfa yuh'yi al-arda ba'da mawtiha inna dhalika lamuh'yi al-mawta wahuwa ala kulli shayin qadirun
ayah_english: So look at (the) effects (of the) Mercy (of) Allah how He gives life (to) the earth after its death Indeed that surely He (will) give life (to) the dead And He (is) on every thing All-Powerful

ayah: فَٱنظُرۡ إِلَىٰٓ ءَاثَٰرِ رَحۡمَتِ ٱللَّهِ كَيۡفَ يُحۡيِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَآۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَمُحۡيِ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ

ayah: وَلَئِنۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا رِيحٗا فَرَأَوۡهُ مُصۡفَرّٗا لَّظَلُّواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ يَكۡفُرُونَ
ayah_translit: wala-in arsalna rihan fara-awhu mus'farran lazallu min ba'dihi yakfuruna
ayah_english: But if We sent a wind and they see it turn yellow certainly they continue after it after it (in) disbelief

ayah: فَإِنَّكَ لَا تُسۡمِعُ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَلَا تُسۡمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ ٱلدُّعَآءَ إِذَا وَلَّوۡاْ مُدۡبِرِينَ
ayah_translit: fa-innaka la tus'mi'u al-mawta wala tus'mi'u al-suma al-du'aa idha wallaw mud'birina
ayah_english: So indeed, you (can) not make the dead hear make the dead hear and not make the deaf hear make the deaf hear the call when they turn retreating

ayah: فَإِنَّكَ لَا تُسۡمِعُ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَلَا تُسۡمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ ٱلدُّعَآءَ إِذَا وَلَّوۡاْ مُدۡبِرِينَ

ayah: فَإِنَّكَ لَا تُسۡمِعُ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَلَا تُسۡمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ ٱلدُّعَآءَ إِذَا وَلَّوۡاْ مُدۡبِرِينَ

ayah: وَمَآ أَنتَ بِهَٰدِ ٱلۡعُمۡيِ عَن ضَلَٰلَتِهِمۡۖ إِن تُسۡمِعُ إِلَّا مَن يُؤۡمِنُ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا فَهُم مُّسۡلِمُونَ
ayah_translit: wama anta bihadi al-'um'yi an dalalatihim in tus'mi'u illa man yu'minu biayatina fahum mus'limuna
ayah_english: And not you can guide the blind from their error Not you can make hear except (those) who believe in Our Verses so they surrender

ayah: ۞ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَكُم مِّن ضَعۡفٖ ثُمَّ جَعَلَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ضَعۡفٖ قُوَّةٗ ثُمَّ جَعَلَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ قُوَّةٖ ضَعۡفٗا وَشَيۡبَةٗۚ يَخۡلُقُ مَا يَشَآءُۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ ٱلۡقَدِيرُ
ayah_translit: al-lahu alladhi khalaqakum min da'fin thumma ja'ala min ba'di da'fin quwwatan thumma ja'ala min ba'di quwwatin da'fan washaybatan yakhluqu ma yashau wahuwa al-'alimu al-qadiru
ayah_english: Allah (is) the One Who created you from weakness then made after after weakness strength then made after after strength weakness and gray hair He creates what He wills and He (is) the All-Knower the All-Powerful

ayah_english: Allah (is) the One Who created you from weakness then made after after weakness strength then made after after strength weakness and gray hair He creates what He wills and He (is) the All-Knower the All-Powerful

ayah: وَيَوۡمَ تَقُومُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ يُقۡسِمُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ مَا لَبِثُواْ غَيۡرَ سَاعَةٖۚ كَذَٰلِكَ كَانُواْ يُؤۡفَكُونَ
ayah_translit: wayawma taqumu al-sa'atu yuq'simu al-muj'rimuna ma labithu ghayra sa'atin kadhalika kanu yu'fakuna
ayah_english: And (the) Day will (be) established the Hour will swear the criminals not they remained but an hour Thus they were deluded

ayah_translit: wayawma taqumu al-sa'atu yuq'simu al-muj'rimuna ma labithu ghayra sa'atin kadhalika kanu yu'fakuna
ayah_english: And (the) Day will (be) established the Hour will swear the criminals not they remained but an hour Thus they were deluded

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡعِلۡمَ وَٱلۡإِيمَٰنَ لَقَدۡ لَبِثۡتُمۡ فِي كِتَٰبِ ٱللَّهِ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡبَعۡثِۖ فَهَٰذَا يَوۡمُ ٱلۡبَعۡثِ وَلَٰكِنَّكُمۡ كُنتُمۡ لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: waqala alladhina utu al-'il'ma wal-imana laqad labith'tum fi kitabi al-lahi ila yawmi al-ba'thi fahadha yawmu al-ba'thi walakinnakum kuntum la ta'lamuna
ayah_english: But will say those who were given the knowledge and the faith Verily you remained by (the) Decree (of) Allah until (the) Day (of) Resurrection And this (is the) Day (of) the Resurrection but you were not knowing

ayah: فَيَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا يَنفَعُ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ مَعۡذِرَتُهُمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُسۡتَعۡتَبُونَ
ayah_translit: fayawma-idhin la yanfa'u alladhina zalamu ma'dhiratuhum wala hum yus'ta'tabuna
ayah_english: So that Day not will profit those who wronged their excuses and not they will be allowed to make amends

ayah_translit: fayawma-idhin la yanfa'u alladhina zalamu ma'dhiratuhum wala hum yus'ta'tabuna
ayah_english: So that Day not will profit those who wronged their excuses and not they will be allowed to make amends

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ ضَرَبۡنَا لِلنَّاسِ فِي هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٖۚ وَلَئِن جِئۡتَهُم بِـَٔايَةٖ لَّيَقُولَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ إِنۡ أَنتُمۡ إِلَّا مُبۡطِلُونَ
ayah_translit: walaqad darabna lilnnasi fi hadha al-qur'ani min kulli mathalin wala-in ji'tahum biayatin layaqulanna alladhina kafaru in antum illa mub'tiluna
ayah_english: And verily We (have) set forth for mankind in this [the] Quran of every example But if you bring them a sign surely will say those who disbelieve Not you (are) except falsifiers

ayah_english: Thus Allah seals Allah seals [on] (the) hearts (of) those who (do) not know

ayah: فَٱصۡبِرۡ إِنَّ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٞۖ وَلَا يَسۡتَخِفَّنَّكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُوقِنُونَ
ayah_translit: fa-is'bir inna wa'da al-lahi haqqun wala yastakhiffannaka alladhina la yuqinuna
ayah_english: So be patient Indeed (the) Promise (of) Allah (is) true And (let) not take you in light estimation those who (are) not certain in faith
